suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'El Bosque, Villaviciosa de Odón', 'title': 'Semi-detached house in Calle Manzana 18 Plan parcial El Monte de la Villa , 18'}
description: We present "Residencial El Lago de Las Hadas", a spectacular urbanization made up of 32 semi-detached houses with an avant-garde and elegant design, where we highlight the volumetry and design of the facades that make this residential shine with its own light, and with about 3.000m of community area made up of wide walks and recreation areas, green areas, a water raft and a spectacular community pool with artificial grass, and of course with a children's pool with the little ones in the house in mind. The residential is made up of 8 semi-detached corner houses with a total plot of 351m and almost 200m of free land, and 24 semi-detached houses with a total plot of 299m and about 150m of free land.The 32 houses are equal in meters and distribution, having 211m built on 2 floors. On the ground floor we find 3 parking spaces on the surface, which we access through an automatic sliding door.Once inside the house, we access through a spacious 7-meter hall that gives access to the 16m kitchen that has been designed in a semi-open concept, to a hall with a built-in wardrobe and access to the bathroom with a shower tray. shower and window, and a comfortable office of almost 11 meters that also has a built-in wardrobe, so it can perfectly be considered as a room if necessary.The dining room of almost 40 meters is characterized by the spaciousness and luminosity conferred by the 3 large windows that give access to the porches and garden that it has. On the first floor we find 3 large bedrooms.The main room is 16m2, plus the large dressing area and the en-suite bathroom with a window and a shower tray.It also gives access to a wonderful terrace of almost 11m that is oriented to the interior of the plot, and therefore has pleasant views of the common area of the residential.The secondary rooms are 12m and 13m, one of them having access to a private terrace.In the same way, there is the secondary bathroom, which in this case comes standard with a bathtub, and you can opt for a shower tray free of charge if you prefer.The third terrace of almost 11 meters has access from the hall, and in this case it would be oriented towards the front facade of the house.As a differentiating element, and always thinking of the practicality and comfort of the buyers, we find a laundry room in which to locate the washer and dryer on the floor of the rooms. The houses have the highest qualities designed for comfort and energy performance.The facades combine large-format prefabricated exposed concrete in white and gray, with wood-effect details, making it a visually warm home.The interior carpentry will be lacquered in white with ceramic floors imitating wood, and with windows with thermal bridge break, being tilt-and-turn and sliding.We also have an extensive list of customization options to suit each of the buyers. Find out without obligation, don't hesitate and come to see this innovative project that will undoubtedly become the house of your dreams!
address: Calle Manzana 18 Plan parcial El Monte de la Villa , 18

description: Monte de la Villa Class is the new residential proposal of the Asentis group in the municipality of Villaviciosa de Odón. 48 chalets, designed by and for you. Designed with precision and dedication to meet and meet the needs of the whole family. Located in one of the central plots of the Monte de la Villa sector, Asentis offers you a wide range of types of 4 and 5 bedroom chalets, configured in two heights so that space is the protagonist of your new home. To complete this experience in which space is the true articulator of each home. All the villas in the promotion have large private outdoor areas with surfaces ranging from 166 m2 to 284 m2, in which you can enjoy without risks and with family and friends. Quality and precision in each finish, where the latest advances in clean energy provide maximum climate comfort through a radiant and refreshing floor system, and where energy efficiency and the minimization of the carbon footprint have inspired all construction solutions. Let yourself be surprised by the common areas designed in every detail so that both adults and children can enjoy multiple activities in a safe space. Swimming pool, paddle tennis, gym, table tennis and a putting green where you can practice your short game, complete our wide range of common spaces. Your new house is waiting for you in the best development of Villaviciosa de Odón, come and discover it.
